Buttons

Use the button classes on an <a>, <button>, or <input> element. Use logical elements for your buttons. If it is not a link do not use a <button> tag instead. If the <a> elements are used to act as buttons – triggering in-page functionality, rather than navigating to another document or section within the current page – they should also be given an appropriate role="button".

Visit the Bootstrap documentation
